person.persName: James Bivian Groom (Caldwell County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Caldwell County, Kentucky, farmer. Virginia native. Married to Elizabeth Snelling Groom in Caldwell County, Kentucky, on May 28, 1845. Father of Christiana M. Groom, Eliza F. Groom, Mary "Mollie" E. Groom, William S. Groom, Major J. Groom, Virginia R. Groom, Lua Mattie Groom, James Bivian Groom, and Charles L. Groom. Farmer in Caldwell County in 1850. Owned seven enslaved persons in Caldwell County in 1850. Farmer in Caldwell County in 1860. Employed Bartlett C. Griffith as an overseer in Caldwell County in 1860. Owned twenty-five enslaved persons in Caldwell County in 1860.
